column2:
```bash
which transit
/d/in16/u/sj003/anaconda3/bin/transit
#this is in base env, so remove it
conda remove transit
#create new env and reinstall
conda create --name tnseq python=3.8
conda activate tnseq
conda install -c bioconda transit
# still doesn't work

# delete that env
conda env remove --name tnseq
# create new one--don't do python first?
conda create --name transit -c bioconda transit
#this works
```
